features: Extra-Large Capacity: This programmable coffee maker brews up to 14 cups of delicious hot coffee at a time.
Small Batch Setting: Includes a 1-4 cup selector for brewing smaller batches of coffee. Also features Grab-a-Cup Auto Pause so that you can grab a cup of coffee before brewing finishes
Strong Brew Selector: Prefer your coffee strong? The Strong Brew Selector allows you to brew for a bolder cup of coffee with the push of a button
Adjustable Keep Warm Setting: The Keep Warm setting adjusts to keep coffee at the perfect temperature for 1 to 4 hours
Reusable Filter: Includes a reusable nylon coffee filter that is dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning
Brew Later Function: The convenient Brew Later function allows you to set the coffee maker ahead of time, so you can wake up to fresh-brewed coffee
Advanced Water Filtration: The included Advanced Water Filtration functionality removes up to 97% of chlorine from the water to keep your coffee tasting its best
body.description: Do you drink coffee all day every day? Love to brew for a crowd? The Mr. Coffee® 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is perfect for you. This extra-large-capacity coffee maker brews up to 14 cups of hot coffee, so you get more coffee with every brew. Plus, its advanced showerhead evenly saturates grounds for more flavor extraction. This coffee machine also features a Small Batch setting for brewing 1-4 cups, a Strong Brew Selector for making bolder coffee, and a Brew Later function so that you can wake up to fresh-brewed coffee. With its adjustable Keep Warm setting, the coffee maker keeps your coffee at the perfect temperature for 1 to 4 hours. After 4 hours, the machine shuts off automatically for peace of mind. A clean machine means better tasting coffee. This coffee maker features an Automatic Cleaning Cycle, and also includes a reusable coffee filter that is dishwasher-safe. For capacity you can count on, the 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is perfect for coffee fans and coffee fams.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brew for the Whole Crew Whether you drink coffee all day every day or love to brew for a crowd the Mr. Coffee 14-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker is perfect for you. This extra-large-capacity coffee maker brews up to 14 cups of hot coffee, so you get more coffee with every brew.

Capacity You Can Count On Extra-Large Capacity Brew up to 14 cups of delicious hot coffee at a time. Small Batch Setting Don’t need a full pot? Brew a small batch of coffee with the 1-4 cup setting. Keep Coffee Warm The Keep Warm timer adjusts to keep coffee at the perfect temperature for 1-4 hours.

Convenient Features Brew Stronger, More Flavorful Coffee The Strong Brew Selector allows you to brew a bolder cup of coffee while the extra-large Advanced Showerhead extracts more coffee flavor. Coffee On Your Schedule Set the coffee maker ahead of time with the Brew Later function, so you can wake up to fresh-brewed coffee. Auto-Clean Cycle The auto-clean cycle reminds you when it’s time to clean, so you can keep your coffee maker performing its best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brews fast, great pitcher with no spills and very easy to use!!!! Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We are very happy
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had various coffeemakers, from the cheapest to hideously expensive; ones that got great reviews and ones that got terrible reviews.This coffeemaker is super easy to use, makes great coffee, easy to clean. I like it better than any I’ve had in years. It also makes enough coffee for our crowd.As other reviewers have mentioned, the only drawback is the fact that a little bit of liquid gets trapped under the spout. This isn’t a problem at all; if you’re using the carafe to fill the reservoir, just empty the teaspoon or sof water out. If you’re pouring coffee out, just empty the teaspoon of coffee out into the sink.Re: the carafe and spout—this coffeemaker’s carafe is much better designed than any others I’ve had. It pours beautifully and unlike my last 2, doesn’t spill anywhere.A lot of coffeemaker for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes good coffee..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not drippy, doesn't overflow much, easy functions, hard to beat
reviews.reviewText: Replacing a coffee maker that overflowed too much (grounds). This one is much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST COFFEE POT EVER
reviews.reviewText: Oh my gosh but there's so many good things to say about this!First, the rain water verses straight water allows all the grounds to be utilized.The reusable filter keeps grounds from going through.And the best thing? The "keep warm" feature! My husband gets up at 4am and used to have to turn the old pot on and off again so it stays hot for me when I get up at 6. You can set it to stay hot for up to 4 hours!Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cut opened and missing instructions
reviews.reviewText: For the price I expected and new in box product. Without the instructions I don’t know how to get the bottom off to get the cord or how to program the coffee maker. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Coffee maker is a bit pricey but worth the cost! Wide pour spout makes pouring easy and no messy drips. Love the chime to let me know its done. And it's 14 cup size is great for company
